languages.text: Райкади Филия, планетоид-тюрьма, охвачена скверной — сам комендант, несмотря на благородную кровь, поддался ереси мятежа. Но не таит ли это местно и более зловещих секретов?
Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid, is corrupted by heresy. Despite his noble lineage, its warden has succumbed to heresy and rebelled. Is this place hiding any other sinister secrets?
languages.original_text: Райкади Филия, планетоид-тюрьма, охвачена скверной — сам комендант, несмотря на благородную кровь, поддался ереси мятежа. Но не таит ли это местно и более зловещих секретов?

traits.locale_text: Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid, is corrupted by heresy. Despite his noble lineage, its warden has succumbed to heresy and rebelled. Is this place hiding any other sinister secrets?
Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid, is corrupted by heresy. Despite his noble lineage, its warden has succumbed to heresy and rebelled. Is this place hiding any other sinister secrets?
Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid, is corrupted by heresy. Despite his noble lineage, its warden has succumbed to heresy and rebelled. Is this place hiding any other sinister secrets?

languages.text: Der Gefängnisplanetoid Rykadi Philia wurde durch Ketzerei verderbt. Trotz seiner adligen Abstammung ist sein Direktor der Ketzerei erlegen und hat rebelliert. Verbirgt dieser Ort noch weitere dunkle Geheimnisse?
languages.original_text: Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid, is corrupted by heresy. Despite his noble lineage, its warden has succumbed to heresy and rebelled. Is this place hiding any other sinister secrets?

traits.locale_text: Der Gefängnisplanetoid Rykadi Philia wurde durch Ketzerei verderbt. Trotz seiner adligen Abstammung ist sein Direktor der Ketzerei erlegen und hat rebelliert. Verbirgt dieser Ort noch weitere dunkle Geheimnisse?

languages.text: Rykadi Philia, le planétoïde carcéral, est corrompu par l'hérésie. En dépit de sa noble lignée, son directeur a succombé à l'hérésie et s'est rebellé. Cet endroit cache-t-il d'autres sinistres secrets ?
languages.original_text: Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid, is corrupted by heresy. Despite his noble lineage, its warden has succumbed to heresy and rebelled. Is this place hiding any other sinister secrets?

traits.locale_text: Rykadi Philia, le planétoïde carcéral, est corrompu par l'hérésie. En dépit de sa noble lignée, son directeur a succombé à l'hérésie et s'est rebellé. Cet endroit cache-t-il d'autres sinistres secrets ?

languages.text: 監獄小惑星ライカディ・フィリアは異端によって堕落している。その高貴な血筋にもかかわらず、ワーデンは異端に屈して反乱を起こした。この場所には他にも不吉な秘密が隠されているのだろうか？
languages.original_text: Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid, is corrupted by heresy. Despite his noble lineage, its warden has succumbed to heresy and rebelled. Is this place hiding any other sinister secrets?

traits.locale_text: 監獄小惑星ライカディ・フィリアは異端によって堕落している。その高貴な血筋にもかかわらず、ワーデンは異端に屈して反乱を起こした。この場所には他にも不吉な秘密が隠されているのだろうか？

languages.text: Rykadi Philia, el planetoide prisión, ha sido corrompido por la herejía. Pese a su noble linaje, su alcaide ha sucumbido a la tentación y se ha rebelado. ¿Qué otros siniestros secretos encierra este lugar?
languages.original_text: Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid, is corrupted by heresy. Despite his noble lineage, its warden has succumbed to heresy and rebelled. Is this place hiding any other sinister secrets?

traits.locale_text: Rykadi Philia, el planetoide prisión, ha sido corrompido por la herejía. Pese a su noble linaje, su alcaide ha sucumbido a la tentación y se ha rebelado. ¿Qué otros siniestros secretos encierra este lugar?

languages.text: 监狱星莱卡德菲利亚星遭到了异端腐化。尽管这里的典狱长来自贵族家族，但这个人已经投靠了异端势力，发起了叛乱。这个地方会不会还隐藏着其他的邪恶秘密？
languages.original_text: Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid, is corrupted by heresy. Despite his noble lineage, its warden has succumbed to heresy and rebelled. Is this place hiding any other sinister secrets?

traits.locale_text: 监狱星莱卡德菲利亚星遭到了异端腐化。尽管这里的典狱长来自贵族家族，但这个人已经投靠了异端势力，发起了叛乱。这个地方会不会还隐藏着其他的邪恶秘密？

languages.text: Cezaevi cüce gezegeni Rykadi Philia, kâfirliğin pençesine düşmüş. Soylu kanına rağmen müdürü, kâfirliğe teslim olarak isyan etmiş. Bu yer başka uğursuz sırların da yatağı olabilir mi?
languages.original_text: Rykadi Philia, the prison planetoid, is corrupted by heresy. Despite his noble lineage, its warden has succumbed to heresy and rebelled. Is this place hiding any other sinister secrets?

traits.locale_text: Cezaevi cüce gezegeni Rykadi Philia, kâfirliğin pençesine düşmüş. Soylu kanına rağmen müdürü, kâfirliğe teslim olarak isyan etmiş. Bu yer başka uğursuz sırların da yatağı olabilir mi?
